title: Any way to tell the age of my account?

replies.body: Unfortunately, we're unable to share specific account information like creation date.  There's no way to really tell you either.  This is a piece of information our account team uses in cases of account recovery, so it's important to keep that information safe and secret.  Hope that helps clear things up.

Yes, thank you for your time
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
